verses.text: \w As|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* morning passeth, \w so|strong="H7121"\w* hath \w the|strong="H3588"\w* king \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w child|strong="H5288"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w loved|strong="H0157"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* out \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w As|strong="H3651"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*, \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w away|strong="H1980"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*: \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w offered|strong="H6999"\w* victims \w to|strong="H1980"\w* Baalim, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w idols|strong="H6456"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0669"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w was|strong="H3808"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* foster father \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w carried|strong="H3947"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w arms|strong="H2220"\w*: \w and|strong="H0669"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w healed|strong="H7495"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w draw|strong="H4900"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cords|strong="H5688"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Adam, \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* bands \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w love|strong="H0160"\w*: \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w one|strong="H0120"\w* \w that|strong="H1961"\w* taketh \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w jaws|strong="H3895"\w*: \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* put \w his|strong="H5921"\w* meat \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* might \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Assyrian \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w converted|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0398"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* hath begun \w in|strong="H3615"\w* \w his|strong="H0398"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w it|strong="H0398"\w* \w shall|strong="H0905"\w* \w consume|strong="H0398"\w* \w his|strong="H0398"\w* chosen men, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w shall|strong="H0905"\w* \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* \w their|strong="H0398"\w* heads.

\w And|strong="H7121"\w* \w my|strong="H7311"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w long|strong="H0413"\w* \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w my|strong="H7311"\w* return: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H7121"\w* yoke \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* put \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, which \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* taken \w off|strong="H7311"\w*.

\w How|strong="H0349"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* deal \w with|strong="H5921"\w* thee, O \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* protect thee, O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? \w how|strong="H0349"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* thee \w as|strong="H5414"\w* Adama, \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* thee \w as|strong="H5414"\w* Seboim? \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* \w within|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w my|strong="H5414"\w* repentance \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w stirred|strong="H3648"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* execute \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fierceness|strong="H2740"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w*: \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w am|strong="H0595"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*: \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* walk \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w roar|strong="H7580"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w lion|strong="H0738"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w roar|strong="H7580"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w fear|strong="H2729"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* fly \w away|strong="H2729"\w* \w like|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w bird|strong="H6833"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w like|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w dove|strong="H3123"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* Assyrians: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w place|strong="H1004"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* own \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.
Ephraim hath compassed me about with denials, and the house of Israel with deceit: but Juda went down as a witness with God, and is faithful with the saints.
